description: Variation of Conditions 1, 3 (i, ii and iii) and 4 and removal of condition 3 (iv) of listed building consent dated 07 September 2018 (RN: 18/06210/LBC) which itself varied condition 1 of listed building consent dated 07 August 2017 (RN: 17/05251/LBC) which itself varied condition 1 of listed building consent  dated 26 October 2015 (RN 15/07095/LBC) for the: amalgamation of Flats J and K at 3rd floor level to form a single 3 bedroom flat. Alterations to front and rear windows at 3rd floor level.  Alterations at roof level associated with the installation of an air conditioning unit and associated screen. NAMELY, to allow changes to the floorplan and to provide details of the windows, the fireplace surround, the works to the floors and to remove the proposed coffered ceiling in the entrance hall.
decision_conditions: +1 Design-intrst of LB apprnce OK in CA
+1 Design-intrst of LB apprnce OK in CA
DES External soil pipes painted black
LB Ext & Int works to match existing
LBC works in accord with apprvd plans
